SDA Hymnal

Search Result

Showing top 4 results for your search «new»

  • Is This a Day of New Beginnings - (342) Chanson Presentation

    Is this a day of new beginnings, Time to remember and move on, Time too believe what love is bringing, Laying to rest the pain that's gone?

  • New Songs of Celebration Render - (13) Chanson Presentation

    New songs of celebration render To Him who has great wonders done. Love sits enthroned in ageless splendor: Come, and adore the mighty One. He has made known His great salvation Which all His friends with joy confess: He has revealed to every nation His everlasting righteousness.

  • Sing a New Song to the Lord - (33) Chanson Presentation

    Sing a new song to the Lord, He to whom wonders belong. Rejoice in His triumph and tell of His power. O sing a new song to the Lord.

  • O Sing a New Song to the Lord - (19) Chanson Presentation

    O sing a new song to the Lord For marvels He has done; His right hand and His holy arm The victory have won.
